name: Mirror's Edge Catalyst Inspired GbFL
description:
I've got too much free time on my hands. 

Here's a little side project I did as I tried to get a feeling for the new Guided by Firelight system and get prepared for the upcoming game jam.

If it seems empty, it is! The mechanics here are replacements for their counterparts in Firelight. If you want access to the other actions and truly the rest of the game, go check out Firelights by Fari RPG!
